Name: Jade Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with mint leaf floated on the cocktail or pegged to the rim.
Review: A Daiquiri with a splash of fresh breath-enhancing orange and mint liqueurs.
Nutrition: One serving of Jade Daiquiri contains 177 calories
